scripts.watch-css: yarn run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
scripts.start: yarn run copy-ext-js && npm-run-all -p watch-css start-js
scripts.build: yarn run copy-ext-js && yarn run build-css && react-scripts build
scripts.build:deploy: react-scripts build && mv build/service-worker.js build/service-worker_ORIGINAL.js && sw-precache --config=sw-precache-ceevee-config.js --verbose
